column1: Little Goat Diner////As for the burger
column3: ' but it certainly was not bad. The goat once again had a different taste from beef
column4: and it was good. I wish there was something fantastic I could say about the burger
column5: but I've had much better in the city (Bad Apple
column6: Butcher and the Burger). It's my fault because I shouldn't order a burger at a place like this
column7: and also I had a standard order
column8: not one of their specialty burgers. For 14 dollars
